results.name: Permutation of natural numbers induced when A245703 is restricted to nonprime numbers: a(n) = 1+A091245(A245703(A018252(n))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n) = 1+A091245(A245703(A018252(n))). [Induced when A245703 is restricted to nonprime numbers].
a(n) = 1+A091226(A245703(A008578(n))). [Induced also when A245703 is restricted to noncomposite numbers].
As a composition of related permutations:
program: for(n=1, 10001, write("b245819.txt", n, " ", A245819(n))); \\ The rest of code can be found in A245703.
